Header: Deaf & Blind Children Get Special Treat
Content: Taking a stock of stationery and gifts to the children in the Kaithady Deaf and Blind School in the Jaffna peninsula, 523 Brigade troops of the 52 Division on account of 10th National War Heroesâ€™ remembrance recently visited the school and interacted with them. Troops provided a special lunch for 150 students and the staff during the occasion and gave away those gift parcels to the children as a tribute to the memory of fallen War Heroes. General Officer Commanding, 52 Division, 523 Brigade Commander, several other Senior Officers and Other Ranks joined the treat at the school for the Deaf and Blind.
